column5: My brother is a bit of a writer. He's converting his trip journals into short stories with pictures.Everything is true, without exaggeration, some stuff has been left out for various reasons (hahaha)hope you enjoy it, it's something to read in the off season for sure, while we wait for springhttp://www.chroniclesoffish.blogspot.ca/
That's awesome writing. I could see being with the group.
What happened with the bear cabin? Roy

Hi RoyI should have mentioned, it's a work in progress, he writes and updates as he gets the time,the "bear cabin" is year 3, the other stuff is year 1 and 2, we've got 12 years in the books so farhe'll likely get the "bear cabin" done in a couple dayshope you guys enjoyed it so far,Chris
